description: User opens wizard to add recipes to agent
steps: Click Add to Agent button in hero section
Verify step indicator shows Select Recipes as active
Click on a cookbook to select it
Verify included recipes show as selected
Click on individual recipes to add
Verify selection count updates in footer
Click Clear all to reset selection
Click Next to go to agent step
Verify Copy Markdown tab is active
Verify combined markdown is in clipboard

description: User configures MCP server for Cursor
steps: Click Next to go to agent step
Verify Cursor tab is selected by default
Verify MCP config JSON is displayed

description: User configures MCP server for VS Code
steps: Verify VS Code MCP config JSON is displayed
Click Add to VS Code button
Verify plugin install commands are displayed
Verify commands include selected cookbook plugins
Verify config switches to Context7 MCP URL
Verify prompt text includes using Context7

description: User uses registry to install code
steps: Select a recipe with registry items
Click Next to go to agent step
Verify shadcn CLI command is displayed
Select a single cookbook with template
Click Next to go to agent step
Verify npx tiged command is displayed
Verify GitHub page opens in new tab

description: Wizard opens from recipe detail page
steps: Click Add to Agent button in header
Verify agent configuration step is shown first
